text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Oguri Cap stares intensely at a<n>magazine in her hands.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Wow... That sea urchin's glistening<n>like liquid gold over a
plate of pasta... It<n>looks more like treasure than it does<n>
food...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
And those warm pancakes look like<n>they'd go perfectly
with that vanilla<n>ice cream... Not to mention all the<n>fresh
fruit. Such an exquisite dish...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's you.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Actually, I was looking for a place to<n>eat on my next day off.
There are so<n>many options though. It took forever<n>for me
to decide...
choice_data_list: So you found a place you like?
So you found a place you like?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I did. Apparently, it's some small,<n>hidden cafe known for its
pasta and<n>pancakes.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's just... The other day, I saw an ad<n>for a similarly hidden
ramen shop and<n>thought I could find my way there...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But I got hopelessly lost, even though<n>I used a map and
everything. I<n>could've sworn I had gotten on the<n>right
train...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I guess they aren't called hidden for<n>nothing. It's no small
feat finding your<n>way there.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Wait... Could it be these shops are<n>disguising themselves
and hiding from<n>public eyes?
choice_data_list:
Disguising themselves? They're not ninja
shops...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm... Then why is it that I wasn't<n>able to reach my
destination? Truly a<n>mystery.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Taking a look at the magazine's map,<n>I notice that it's a bit
difficult to<n>navigate. I'm not sure if Oguri Cap<n>would be
able to find her way there by<n>herself...
choice_data_list: How about I go with you?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Really?! You'd do that?!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
With you by my side, I'm sure we'll<n>get there without a
problem. I'll gladly<n>take you up on that offer, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Our next day off rolls around, and<n>after a short train ride, we
find<n>ourselves standing in front of the<n>tucked-away cafe.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
So this is where it is... You sure know<n>your way around
town. Not even a<n>single wrong turn.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's nothing... I just feel a bit out of<n>place... I mean, look
around you! It's<n>so fancy.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Is it okay for me to be dressed like<n>this? I heard some
restaurants in the<n>city kick you out if you're dressed<n>
poorly...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I see... That's a relief to hear, but... I<n>still feel like I'm
somehow standing<n>out...

text_block_list.name: Waitress A
text_block_list.text: Are you ready to order?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah, umm... Let's see... What was I<n>gonna order, again?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's it. I forgot what they're<n>called though... Some<n>
hard-to-remember names...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
They were both in French, I think...<n>One of them was a sea
urchin pasta...
choice_data_list:
We'll have two plates of sea urchin pasta, thank
you.

text_block_list.name: Waitress A
text_block_list.text: Ah, the "lumière dorèe" pâtes à la<n>crème.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
So you can order without knowing the<n>dish's actual name...
I see.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, but could we also get two<n>servings of those
pancakes topped<n>with fresh fruit?

text_block_list.name: Waitress A
text_block_list.text: Two crêpes aux fruits. Very well.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Did you see that? I ordered<n>something on my own!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unaccustomed to fancy eateries, Oguri<n>Cap seems a bit on
edge at first. Her<n>anxiety, however, vanishes along<n>with
her food.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
That was delicious. So many flavors I<n>didn't even know
existed. Each bite<n>was absolutely divine, but they'd last<n>
only a second...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hey, I have an idea. Why don't we<n>get seconds?!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Our meal ended too soon. I feel like I<n>can eat some more,
and since we're<n>already here...
choice_data_list:
Let's do it! But how about we try something
else?

Let's do it! But how about we try something
else?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Something... else? Now that youmention it, that does sound nice...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
The pasta and pancakes were both<n>amazing. I'm sure
everything else on<n>the menu wouldn't disappoint.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
The question is... What do I order<n>next? A dilemma more
difficult than<n>any school exam...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap sits at the table, flipping<n>through the menu for
about half an<n>hour.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, I can't decide! Everything<n>looks good! Looking at the
menu just<n>makes me want to order it all!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Wait... Maybe I'll do exactly that.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Let's order everything on the menu.<n>What do you say?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Too much, huh? Then could you at<n>least order for me? What
are you<n>feeling?
choice_data_list: The hamburger steak pie sounds delicious.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hmmm... I've never tried that before.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
All right, sounds good. Might as well<n>try it while we're here,
right? I'll order<n>the food.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Bubbling with childlike excitement,<n>Oguri Cap raises her
hand to call over<n>the waitress, ordering a "beef pie<n>thing"
for the two of us.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
The pie crust is nice and crispy, and<n>the balance of
sweetness and acidity<n>in the berry sauce is perfect! Not to<n>
mention the super juicy patty...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm so happy, I feel like I could be<n>dreaming.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I wasn't too sure about eating meat<n>with a fruity sauce, but
this was better<n>than I imagined.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for the recommendation. I<n>would never have tried
something like<n>this if it weren't for you.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's nice to get out of my comfort<n>zone once in a while and
eat what<n>other people like!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for today. The food was<n>fantastic, and I had a
bunch of fun.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: That's good to hear. This day<n>couldn't be any better.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: All right. On to our next destination.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I usually only go to nearby places<n>when I'm alone, but since
you said<n>you'd show me around, I wanna<n>make the most
of it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I highlighted a couple other shops that<n>caught my eye while
I was preparing<n>for this trip.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It might not be lunchtime anymore, but<n>judging by the state
of my stomach, I<n>could stop by at least 10 more spots.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Since we're going to spend the entire<n>day cafe hopping, I'll
be counting on<n>you, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap quickly picks up her pace,<n>and we end up popping
into every<n>single cafe on her list...
